item.title: Question.. yes again-.-

item.description:
@mod_lol1 wrote:

Ok I got 1 question… How can I make this code delta:

if (NpcDialogue == 29) { NpcDialogue = 0; NpcDialogueSend = false; if (playerIsMember == 0) { if(playerHasItemAmount(995, 100000000)) { try { sendMessage("You Are Now A Member!"); BufferedWriter bw = null; bw = new BufferedWriter(new FileWriter("data/members.txt", true)); bw.write(""+playerName+""); bw.newLine(); bw.flush(); disconnected = false; } catch(IOException ioexception) { misc.println("membership.txt: error loading file."); } deleteItem(995, getItemSlot(995), 100000000); playerIsMember = 1; } else { sendMessage("You dont have enough money to become a member!"); } } else { sendMessage("You are already a member!"); }}

would someone please edit it for me.
